MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G45 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:40am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Glenacre Drive substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  2:05pm on Saturday, 06 February 2021
